[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/
[\[188a.2\]]rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/skye mched drug gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/
[\[188a.3\]]tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/len pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/srid pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su 
[\[188a.4\]]bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[188a.5\]]phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[188a.6\]]rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[188a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar 
[\[188b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rang gi 
[\[188b.3\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[188b.4\]]kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 
[\[188b.5\]]rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/
[\[188b.6\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/
[\[188b.7\]]bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rnam 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[189a.2\]]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang 
[\[189a.3\]]bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin 
[\[189a.4\]]yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus 
[\[189a.5\]]so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/dgra bcom 
[\[189a.6\]]pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs 
[\[189a.7\]]su bsngo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhan zhig bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam/_yang dag par bskul lam/_yang dag par spro ba bskyed 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]dam/_yang dag par dga' bar bya na/_yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/_/yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de yang 
[\[189b.2\]]ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[189b.3\]]do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag 
[\[189b.4\]]ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_shes 
[\[189b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_
[\[189b.6\]]phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_stong pa nyid stong 
[\[189b.7\]]pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[190a.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[190a.3\]]la sbyong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[190a.4\]]bdag ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad stong 
[\[190a.5\]]pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 
[\[190a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod 
[\[190a.7\]]do/_/zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_yang 
[\[190b.2\]]dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par 
[\[190b.3\]]rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni dbang po rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur 
[\[190b.4\]]ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam 
[\[190b.5\]]yan lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[190b.6\]]rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_gzugs 
[\[190b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 
[\[191a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par 
[\[191a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar 
[\[191a.4\]]rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni de 
[\[191a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[191a.6\]]rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_snying rje chen 
[\[191a.7\]]po la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni lan cig 
[\[191b.2\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod 
[\[191b.3\]]pa'i tshe/_bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rang byang chub la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 
[\[191b.4\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[191b.5\]]'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya/_yang dag par bskul bar bya/_yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya/_yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[191b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/_/yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de yang dag par bstan pa de dang yang dag par bskul ba de dang /_yang dag 
[\[191b.7\]]par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang /_yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ba des gzhan yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang /_yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe/_rma 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur zhing sangs rgyas 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te/_de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi 
[\[192a.2\]]pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so/_/zhes bya ba gnang ste/_rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[192a.3\]]rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba dag bstan par byas/_de dag shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[192a.4\]]de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[192a.5\]]byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na/_rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o/_/gang yang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang 
[\[192a.6\]]da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan 
[\[192a.7\]]mar yid la byed cing /_yid la byas nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o/_/gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang de ma 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o/_/
[\[192b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 
[\[192b.3\]]zab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[192b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas/_mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/_de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs 
[\[192b.5\]]ma rgyas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/_chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do/_/rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no/_/
[\[192b.6\]]gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o/_/gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'du ma byas 
[\[192b.7\]]pa/_shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos ma rtogs rnam par ma shes/_mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'o/_/
[\[193a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so/_/gzugs kyis ma shes so/_/tshor bas ma shes so/_/'du shes kyis ma shes so/_/'du byed kyis ma shes so/_/rnam par shes pas ma 
[\[193a.3\]]shes so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gis ma shes so/_/rna bas ma shes so/_/snas ma shes so/_/lces ma shes so/_/lus kyis ma shes so/_/yid kyis ma shes so/_/gzugs kyis ma shes so/_/sgras ma shes so/_/dris ma shes so/_/ros 
[\[193a.4\]]ma shes so/_/reg gis ma shes so/_/chos kyis ma shes so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pas ma shes so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so/_/sna'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so/_/lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so/_/
[\[193a.5\]]lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg 
[\[193a.6\]]pas ma shes so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/_/sna'i 
[\[193a.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/_/sa'i 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]khams kyis ma shes so/_/chu'i khams kyis ma shes so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyis ma shes so/_/rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so/_/nam mkha'i khams kyis ma shes so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma shes so/_/ma rig 
[\[193b.2\]]pas ma shes so/_/'du byed kyis ma shes so/_/rnam par shes pas ma shes so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyis ma shes so/_/skye mched drug gis ma shes so/_/reg pas ma shes so/_/tshor bas ma shes so/_/sred pas ma shes so/_/
[\[193b.3\]]len pas ma shes so/_/srid pas ma shes so/_/skye bas ma shes so/_/rga shis ma shes so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/_/
[\[193b.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/_/nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[193b.5\]]kyis ma shes so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/
[\[193b.6\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma 
[\[193b.7\]]shes so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]ma shes so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma shes so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma shes so/_/dbang po rnams kyis ma shes so/_/stobs rnams 
[\[194a.2\]]kyis ma shes so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so/_/bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis 
[\[194a.3\]]ma shes so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis ma shes so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma shes so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[194a.4\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ma shes so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma shes so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ma shes so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[194a.5\]]'jigs pa rnams kyis ma shes so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma shes so/_/byams pa chen pos ma shes so/_/snying rje chen pos ma shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis ma shes so/_/rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[194a.6\]]pa'i 'bras bus ma shes so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/rang byang chub kyis ma shes so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma shes 
[\[194a.7\]]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u nyi shu bdun no//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byed pa po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[194b.2\]]pa dang /_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rna ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sna [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lce [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_
[\[194b.3\]]lus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sgra [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dri [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ro [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_reg [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_chos [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[194b.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[194b.5\]]dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yid

[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rlung gi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ma rig pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[195a.2\]]pa dang /_'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_skye mched drug [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sred pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_

[\[195a.4\]]phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[195a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'dus ma 
[\[195a.6\]]byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_chos 
[\[195a.7\]]thams cad stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dngos po 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dren pa nye bar gzhag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dbang po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_stobs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[195b.2\]]kyi yan lag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[195b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes 
[\[195b.4\]]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_byams pa 
[\[195b.5\]]chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_snying rje chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong 
[\[195b.6\]]ba'i 'bras bu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rang byang chub [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[195b.7\]]'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te gzugs la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal 
[\[196a.2\]]te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs 
[\[196a.3\]]sdug ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa 'am/_bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bdag gam bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_sdug pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug par 
[\[196a.4\]]'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gal te tshor ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te tshor brtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am 
[\[196a.5\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar 
[\[196a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang rtag pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bdag gam bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_sdug pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gal

[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol

[\[200a\]]

[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las

[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]pa 'am/_sdug pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i srid pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_gal te skye ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te skye ba rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/
[\[207b.2\]]gal te skye ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te skye ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te skye ba sdug 
[\[207b.3\]]ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang rtag pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa 'am/_bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bdag gam bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am sdug pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug par 'gyur ba de lta 
[\[207b.4\]]bu'i skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gal te rga shi la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rga shi rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rga shi bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug 
[\[207b.5\]]bsngal zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rga shi bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rga shi sdug ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod

[\[207b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar

[\[220b.1\]]gam/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_sdug pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_/rang 'byor

[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_

[\[228b.1\]]su rdzogs so zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]bo rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te stobs rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu

[\[229a.3\]]lag rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin

[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[231b.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang /_ma chags pa legs par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[231b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang /_
[\[231b.4\]]ma chags pa legs par bstan to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha

[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te [{]myig [,]mig [}]chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya

[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te chos chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal 
[\[232b.2\]]te [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[237a.4\]]'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa

[\[241b.1\]]rnams ma mchis so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan

[\[241b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 
[\[241b.6\]]'tshal ba de dag ni/_phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/_'bad par mos/_rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can 
[\[241b.7\]]rnams kyi slad du/_go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing /_yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/_
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdegs par 'tshal ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[242a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[242a.3\]]po gang sems can rnams kyi don du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos 
[\[242a.4\]]rnams kyi slad du/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/_dpa' bo bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa/_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom 
[\[242a.5\]]ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta ste/_dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam 'bras kyi shing ngam/_til gyi zhing bzhin du 
[\[242a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa 
[\[242a.7\]]yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am 'gang ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gda'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sems can ma mchis pa dang sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/_de bzhin du gal te phyogs 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste/_dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam/_'bras kyi zhing ngam til gyi zhing bzhin 
[\[242b.2\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongs su 
[\[242b.3\]]mya ngan las bzlas kyang /_sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am 'gang bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]gda' 'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sems can ma mchis pa dang /_sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_bdag 'di 
[\[242b.4\]]skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal pa de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags 
[\[242b.5\]]zhes mchi'o/_/de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/_gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yang yod/_shes rab kyi phung po yang yod/_
[\[242b.6\]]rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang yod/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/_dgra bcom 
[\[242b.7\]]pa nyid kyang yod/_/rang byang chub kyang yod/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/_rgyun tu zhugs pa yang yod/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba yang yod/_dgra bcom pa yang yod/_rang sangs 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]rgyas kyang yod/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang yod/_chos dkon mchog kyang yod/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod 
[\[243a.2\]]chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/snyam pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 
[\[243a.3\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/_de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/_rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[243a.4\]]la bslab par sems pa de ni/_nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[243a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bag bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 
[\[243a.6\]]bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_smras 
[\[243a.7\]]pa btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/_de la [{]myi'am [,]mi'am [}{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams 
[\[243b.2\]]kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[243b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par sems pa ste/_de ni bsam pa ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grub 
[\[243b.4\]]cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis sgyu ma dang /_smyig rgyu dang /[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam dang /_sgra brnyan dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab 
[\[243b.5\]]par nus sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab 
[\[243b.6\]]par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grub cing /_dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab 
[\[243b.7\]]par nus sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grub cing /_dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_bsam 
[\[244a.2\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par nus sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[244a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grub cing /_dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces 
[\[244a.4\]]smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu'i chos dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta 
[\[244a.5\]]bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang /_de ltar yongs su shes pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]
[\[244a.6\]]lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu mas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_

[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_

[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_/dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems

[\[245a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshor bas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshor ba la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed na/_de [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam gyis 
[\[245a.4\]]rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgyu ma rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu mas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma la

[\[245a.6\]]gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su 
[\[245a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sprul pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[245b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du shes kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du shes bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du shes la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed na/_de [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]
[\[245b.3\]]lam gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgyu ma rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu mas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[245b.4\]]sgyu ma la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de smyig rgyu rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyus rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgra brnyan rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra 
[\[245b.5\]]brnyan gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor bdag gi zhes 
[\[245b.6\]]rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer la 
[\[245b.7\]]rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sprul pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du byed kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du byed bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du byed la rlom sems

[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sprul pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/
[\[249b.2\]]kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_gzugs kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[249b.3\]]gzugs la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed na/_de [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgyu ma rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[249b.4\]]sgyu mas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de smyig rgyu rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyus rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[249b.5\]]byed/_smyig rgyu la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgra brnyan rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor

[\[259b.1\]]pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus kyi 
[\[259b.2\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lus kyi 'dus te reg las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa

[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgra brnyan rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rlom

[\[262b.4\]]sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa'i khams rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis rlom

[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[263a.2\]{]myig [,]mig [}]yor la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/

[\[263a.4\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ma rig pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_ma rig pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_ma rig pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_ma rig pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed na/_de [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam gyis

[\[266a.1\]]sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de smyig rgyu rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyus rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu

[\[266a.6\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sred pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed na/_de [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgyu ma rlom sems

[\[269b\]]

[\[269b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[270a\]]

[\[279a.3\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems

[\[279b.1\]]gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sprul pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed

[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[280a.2\]]pa'i tshe/_yang dag par spong ba rnams rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yang dag par spong pa rnams la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed 
[\[280a.3\]]na/_de [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do_/de sgyu ma rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu mas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu

[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su

[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]sgyu ma rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu mas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de smyig rgyu rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyus rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig 
[\[290b.2\]]rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgra brnyan rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan la rlom sems 
[\[290b.3\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[290b.4\]]dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sprul pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul 
[\[290b.5\]]pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rlom sems 
[\[290b.6\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed na/_de [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[290b.7\]{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgyu ma rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu mas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de smyig rgyu rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyus rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[291a.2\]]byed do/_/de sgra brnyan rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor 
[\[291a.3\]]gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer 
[\[291a.4\]]bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sprul pa rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su 
[\[291a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su 
[\[291a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed na/_de [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam bdag 
[\[291a.7\]]gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgyu ma rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu mas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgyu ma la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de smyig rgyu 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyus rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_smyig rgyu la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sgra brnyan rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra 
[\[291b.2\]]brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra brnyan la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor la rlom 
[\[291b.3\]]sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de sprul pa 
[\[291b.4\]]rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po 
[\[291b.5\]]nyi shu pa/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_mtshe ma'i lha dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha 
[\[291b.6\]]dang /_'phrul dga'i lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha dang /_snang ba'i lha dang /_chung snang gi lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[291b.7\]]snang ba'i lha dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /_dge ba'i lha dang /_chung dge'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha dang /_che ba'i lha dang /_chung che'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[292a.2\]]mngon par 'thor zhing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya 
[\[292a.3\]]byin dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_shar phyogs kyi sangs 
[\[292a.4\]]rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_
[\[292a.5\]]de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/_mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge 
[\[292a.6\]]slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing 
[\[292a.7\]]yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/_/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /_yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs 
[\[292b.2\]]rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/_mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba 
[\[292b.3\]]dang /_de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /_yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/_/byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa 
[\[292b.4\]]mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes 
[\[292b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /_yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/_chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 
[\[292b.6\]]'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid 
[\[292b.7\]]zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/_chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba 
[\[293a.2\]]sems la snang bar gyur to/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid 
[\[293a.3\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /_yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/_/'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi 
[\[293a.4\]]ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/_mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de na lha'i 
[\[293a.5\]]dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /_yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/_/steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/_dge slong 
[\[293a.6\]]rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /_de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /_yongs 
[\[293a.7\]]su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[293b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang /_sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 
[\[293b.3\]]'das rnam pa gang dang /_rtags gang dang mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 
[\[293b.4\]]ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'di la rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byams pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[293b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzugs 
[\[293b.6\]]bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[293b.7\]]gzugs bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzugs 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzugs da ltar byung 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshor ba 
[\[294a.2\]]bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshor ba 
[\[294a.3\]]bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshor ba 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshor ba ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshor ba da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston 
[\[294a.4\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya 
[\[294a.5\]]bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du shes zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du shes bcings shes bya ba 'am grol 
[\[294a.6\]]zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du shes 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du shes ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du shes da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[294a.7\]]'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du byed zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du byed bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par 
[\[294b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du byed 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du byed ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'du byed da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa rtag ces 
[\[294b.3\]]bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[294b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am 
[\[294b.5\]]grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa de ltar byung zhes bya bar chos

[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
