[\[298b.3\]]ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces 
[\[298b.4\]]bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/

[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams 'das zhes bya bar

[\[302b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rlung gi khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rlung gi khams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rlung gi khams sdug ces bya ba 'am

[\[306b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar 
[\[306b.3\]]chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[306b.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'ongs 
[\[306b.5\]]zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[306b.6\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[306b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcings zhes bya ba

[\[307a.1\]]'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar

[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces 
[\[310b.2\]]bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[310b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'das shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston 
[\[310b.4\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[310b.5\]]bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par 
[\[310b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'das shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs shes bya bar 
[\[310b.7\]]chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bde zhes 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces 
[\[311a.2\]]bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[311a.3\]]stong pa nyid 'das shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces 
[\[311a.4\]]bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[311a.5\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston

[\[311a.7\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi 
[\[311b.2\]]zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'das shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[311b.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston

[\[312b\]]

[\[312b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'das 
[\[313a.2\]]shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[313a.3\]]brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces

[\[313a.7\]]bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bcings shes

[\[313b.7\]]bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshad 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams 'das shes bya bar chos ston par

[\[314a.7\]]chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]pa brgyad sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par

[\[314b.3\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mthar

[\[314b.5\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mthar

[\[314b.7\]]dgu da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bdag ces bya ba 'am 
[\[315a.2\]]bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_

[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/

[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/thams cad shes pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am

[\[317b.4\]]bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag

[\[317b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/

[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[318a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur/_ston ni ci zhig ston par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag 
[\[318a.3\]]pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/'du shes shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/'du byed shin tu rnam par 
[\[318a.4\]]dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 
[\[318a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/rna ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/sna shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/lce shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[318a.6\]]chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/lus shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/yid shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes 
[\[318a.7\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/sgra shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/dri shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/ro shin tu rnam par 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/reg shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/chos shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[318b.2\]]gi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa shin 
[\[318b.3\]]tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu

[\[318b.7\]]par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/lce'i 'dus

[\[319b\]]

[\[322a\]]

[\[323a\]]

[\[323b\]]

[\[323b.5\]]phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag 
[\[323b.6\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
[\[323b.7\]]pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/dbang po yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]yongs su dag pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/'phags 
[\[324a.2\]]pa'i bden pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu 
[\[324a.3\]]phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/
[\[324a.4\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[324a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[324a.6\]]yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi 
[\[324a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 
[\[324b.2\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[324b.3\]]phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rang byang chub yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[324b.4\]]yongs su dag pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[324b.5\]]pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na 'du shes yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji 
[\[324b.6\]]ltar na 'du byed yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[324b.7\]]slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rna ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na sna yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na lce yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na lus yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa 
[\[325a.2\]]lags/_ji ltar na yid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na sgra yongs su 
[\[325a.3\]]dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na dri yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na ro yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[325a.4\]]pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na reg yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na chos yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji 
[\[325a.5\]]ltar na [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji 
[\[325a.6\]]ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar 
[\[325a.7\]]na lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]ji ltar na [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na sna'i 
[\[325b.2\]]'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[325b.3\]]yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[325b.4\]]tshor ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na sna'i

[\[325b.6\]]ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[325b.7\]]su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na sa'i khams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na chu'i khams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]khams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rlung gi khams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na nam mkha'i 
[\[326a.2\]]khams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na ma rig pa yongs su dag 
[\[326a.3\]]pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na 'du byed yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]

[\[326a.5\]]ji ltar na reg pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na sred pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_
[\[326a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na len pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na srid pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_

[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs

[\[326b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[326b.7\]]phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_
[\[327a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes 
[\[327a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab 
[\[327a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[327a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi 
[\[327a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 
[\[327a.7\]]yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na dbang po yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na stobs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na 'phags

[\[327b.6\]]'dzin yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag

[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su dag

[\[328a.3\]]pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_

[\[328a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[328a.6\]]'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o/_/tshor ba la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni tshor ba yongs su dag 
[\[328a.7\]]pa'o/_/'du shes la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni 'du shes yongs su dag pa'o/_/'du byed la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni 'du byed yongs su dag pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor [{]myig [,]mig [}]la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[328b.2\]]'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa'o/_/rna ba la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni rna ba yongs su dag pa'o/_/

[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o/_/rang byang

[\[333b.7\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]nam mkha' gzung du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[334a.2\]]'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar nam mkha' la tha snyad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag

[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/

[\[334b.5\]]ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[334b.6\]]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang gya nom snang ba dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu 
[\[334b.7\]]phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang chos brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/_
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[335a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bco lnga dag la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 
[\[335a.3\]]'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams mang du 'phel te/_bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/_gzhal du med pa dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[335a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/_/rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di lta ste/_sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas dang /_
[\[335a.5\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/_/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/_/bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/_/khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/_/rgyal 
[\[335a.6\]]chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/mtshe ma'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/dga' ldan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/'phrul dga'i lha'i 
[\[335a.7\]]skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/tshangs ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i skye 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/tshangs chen gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/chung snang gi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/kun snang 
[\[335b.2\]]dang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/chung dge'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/dge rgyas kyi lha'i skye pa'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/
[\[335b.3\]]che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/chung che'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/
[\[335b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched 
[\[335b.5\]]kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin 
[\[335b.6\]]pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 'byin pa'o/_/rang byang chub 'byin pa'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[335b.7\]]'byin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/_de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[336a.2\]]'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 
[\[336a.3\]]yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i 
[\[336a.4\]]lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i 
[\[336a.5\]]lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod 
[\[336a.6\]]do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod 
[\[336a.7\]]do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di yod na/_bsam gtan bzhi yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yod do/_/gzugs med pa'i 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yod do/_/dbang po lnga yod do/_/stobs lnga yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yod do/_/'phags 
[\[336b.2\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod 
[\[336b.3\]]do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus 
[\[336b.4\]]byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong

[\[336b.6\]]bzhi yod do/_/bsam gtan bzhi yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yod do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam 
[\[336b.7\]]par thar pa'i sgo gsum yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yod do/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi yod do/_/so so yang dag 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]par rig pa bzhi yod do/_/byams pa chen po yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yod do/_/thams cad shes pa nyid yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[337a.2\]]de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing 
[\[337a.3\]]mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 
[\[337a.4\]]kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[337a.5\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[337a.6\]]chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod 
[\[337a.7\]]do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong pa rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod 
[\[337b.2\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/de bas na de la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[337b.3\]]pa 'am/_rnam par byang ba 'am/_yongs su gzung ba 'am dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang ba 'am yongs su gzung ba 'am dor bar bya ba'i chos 
[\[337b.4\]]de lta bu [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba 'am 'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'am zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang 
[\[337b.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang 'go ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos 
[\[337b.6\]]de lta bu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_rab 'byor de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar 'du shes pa yang 
[\[337b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed la de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ltar 'phro bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/_/
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang mchod par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs 
[\[338a.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston 
[\[338a.3\]]pa 'am rnam par ston pa 'am yongs su ston pa 'am/_'dzin par byed pa 'am 'byin par byed pa 'am skye bar byed pa 'am 'gog par byed pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/_rnam par dag par byed pa 'am/_'grib par byed pa 'am 'phel

[\[338a.5\]]khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/_gnas par byed pa ma yin/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/_gnas par byed pa ma yin//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam 
[\[338a.6\]]po nyi shu gsum pa/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma 
[\[338a.7\]]yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid sgrub 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_phyi stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_phyi nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_chen po stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_

[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]rnams sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_rnam par thar pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong

[\[339a.4\]]chen po sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_snying rje chen po sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[339a.5\]]ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin/_'dor ba ma yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub 
[\[339a.6\]]pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[339a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/_de ni de 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par thugs su chud do/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo /_ston to rjod do/_'grel to/_rnam par 'byed do/_
[\[339b.2\]]gsal bar mdzad do/_yang dag par ston to/_/de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldags kyi sgra phyung ste/_lha rdzas kyi me tog ud+pa la dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mud dang /_puN+da ri ka dang /_man+dA ra ba dang /_man+dA ra 
[\[339b.3\]]ba chen pos 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/_/kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/_lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/_'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bar 
[\[339b.4\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no/_/
[\[339b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[339b.6\]]'khor bar bgyi pa'i slad du nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/
[\[339b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/tshul 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid

[\[340a.7\]]stong ngo /_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo /_/stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo /_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo /_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[340b.2\]]'jug pa rnams gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[340b.3\]]kyis stong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas stong ngo /_/mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/ting

[\[340b.6\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo /_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo /_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras

[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]nyid kyis stong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin stong pa'o/_/de ni 
[\[341a.2\]]chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang chos

[\[341a.4\]]mthong ba ma mchis pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/_rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis te/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par

[\[345a.5\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[345a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[345a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[345b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[345b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi nang gi chos [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[345b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[345b.5\]]stsal pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_

[\[345b.7\]]kyis dben pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]ngo bo nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[346a.2\]]lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[346a.3\]]dge ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzu 'phrul

[\[346a.5\]]ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stobs lnga [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di

[\[346a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab 
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes

[\[346b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa dang ser sna [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom

[\[347a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[347a.5\]]shes rab dang 'chal ba'i shes rab [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thabs ma 
[\[347a.6\]]yin pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam ma yin pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[347a.7\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stobs chung ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
