[\[347b.3\]]'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[347b.4\]]ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes 
[\[347b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[347b.6\]]phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[347b.7\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[348a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 
[\[348a.3\]]stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u nyi shu dgu'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la 
[\[348a.4\]]bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi/_rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni 
[\[348a.5\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/_/gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bzung ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_klag pa dang kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du shes 
[\[348a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sngang /_skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[348a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so yongs su zhus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang 
[\[348b.2\]]ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/_/brtson 
[\[348b.3\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do snyam pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[348b.4\]]ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du 
[\[348b.5\]]yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/_sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[348b.6\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pas ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[348b.7\]]pa zab mo 'di thos kyang mos par bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems pa de dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad 
[\[349a.2\]]du ste/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[349a.3\]]phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu 
[\[349a.4\]]phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_phyi stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ji 
[\[349a.5\]]ltar bsgom par bgyi/_chen po stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar 
[\[349a.6\]]bsgom par bgyi/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_rang gi mtshan 
[\[349a.7\]]nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji 
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]ltar bsgom par bgyi/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_dbang po rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_stobs 
[\[349b.2\]]rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_bsam gtan rnams ni ji 
[\[349b.3\]]ltar bsgom par bgyi/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_rnam par thar pa brgyud ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 
[\[349b.4\]]ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_
[\[349b.5\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_sangs rgyas 
[\[349b.6\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus yongs su ma dris so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[349b.7\]]tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa 
[\[350a.2\]]nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha 
[\[350a.3\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid 
[\[350a.4\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[350a.5\]]dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_
[\[350a.6\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de 
[\[350a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa 
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
[\[350b.2\]]shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin te/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 
[\[350b.3\]]phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do/_/
[\[350b.4\]]kau shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[350b.5\]]mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[350b.6\]]bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[350b.7\]]phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/sems can rnams lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/sems can rnams phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha 
[\[351a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/sems can rnams rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/sems can rnams bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[351a.3\]]la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par 
[\[351a.4\]]bya'o/_/khams gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/bdud pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/
[\[351a.5\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[351a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[351a.7\]]dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[351b.2\]]pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[351b.3\]]pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid la brtson 
[\[351b.4\]]par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_
[\[351b.5\]]ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chen po stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi 
[\[351b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[351b.7\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes 
[\[352a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha 
[\[352a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab 
[\[352a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha 
[\[352a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar 
[\[352a.6\]]na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji 
[\[352a.7\]]ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dbang po rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_stobs rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha 
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab 
[\[352b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[352b.3\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes 
[\[352b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_
[\[352b.5\]]ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes 
[\[352b.6\]]pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 
[\[352b.7\]]brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byams pa chen 
[\[353a.2\]]po la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_snying rje chen po la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[353a.3\]]brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so 
[\[353a.4\]]legs so/_/kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin kyis byung ngo /_/kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[353a.5\]]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_/kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe 
[\[353a.6\]]gzugs la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_gzugs la brtson par byed do/_/tshor ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe tshor ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_tshor ba la brtson par byed do/_/'du shes la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe 'du shes la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[353a.7\]]gnas pa de'i tshe/_'du shes la brtson par byed do/_/'du byed la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe 'du byed la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_'du byed la brtson par byed do/_/rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]gnas pa de'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe [{]myig [,]mig [}]la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]la brtson par byed do/_/rna ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe rna ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_rna ba la brtson 
[\[353b.2\]]par byed do/_/sna la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe sna la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_sna la brtson par byed do/_/lce la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe lce la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_lce la brtson par byed do/_/lus la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe lus la 
[\[353b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_lus la brtson par byed do/_/yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_yid la brtson par byed do/_/gzugs la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe gzugs la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_gzugs la 
[\[353b.4\]]brtson par byed do/_/sgra la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe sgra la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_sgra la brtson par byed do/_/dri la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe dri la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_dri la brtson par byed do/_/ro la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe ro 
[\[353b.5\]]la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_ro la brtson par byed do/_/reg la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe reg la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_reg la brtson par byed do/_/chos la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe chos la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_chos la brtson par 
[\[353b.6\]]byed do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe rna ba'i 
[\[353b.7\]]rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe sna'i rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_sna'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]la brtson par byed do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe lce'i rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_lce'i rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas 
[\[354a.2\]]te/_gang gi tshe lus kyi rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe yid kyi rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_yid kyi rnam par 
[\[354a.3\]]shes pa la brtson par byed do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_
[\[354a.4\]]gang gi tshe rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gang gi tshe sna'i 'dus te reg pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de'i tshe/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa la

[\[361b.1\]]de'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed de gang gi tshe [{]myig [,]mig [}]la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed pa de'i tshe/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]la brtson par byed do/_/rna ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed de gang gi tshe rna ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed pa de'i tshe/_rna ba

[\[365a.1\]]stobs rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed de/_gang gi tshe stobs rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed pa de'i tshe/_stobs rnams la brtson par byed do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed de/_gang gi tshe byang chub kyi yan lag

[\[365b.1\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed de/_gang gi tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed pa de'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa

[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/

[\[368a.3\]]ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus 
[\[368a.4\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi 
[\[368a.5\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yid 
[\[368a.6\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi 
[\[368a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sa'i khams sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chu'i

[\[371a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sngon 
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'phags 
[\[371b.2\]]pa'i bden pa rnams sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam 
[\[371b.3\]]gtan rnams sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan rnams phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan rnams dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[371b.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[371b.5\]]so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa brgyad sngon gyi 
[\[371b.6\]]mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[371b.7\]]dgu sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa phyi ma'i 
[\[372a.2\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[372a.3\]]mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[372a.4\]]rnams phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[372a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu phyi ma'i 
[\[372a.6\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[372a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byams pa chen po sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byams pa chen po phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byams 
[\[372b.2\]]pa chen po dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_snying rje chen po sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/snying rje chen po phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/snying rje chen po dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab 
[\[372b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dbus 
[\[372b.4\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thams cad shes pa nyid sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad shes pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad shes pa nyid dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[372b.5\]]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[372b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[372b.7\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab 
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab 
[\[373a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[373a.3\]]ti'i bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha 
[\[373a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i de bzhin nyid zab ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi de 
[\[373a.5\]]bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[373a.6\]]tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i 
[\[373a.7\]]phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 
[\[373b.2\]]rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[373b.3\]]zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[373b.4\]]tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 
[\[373b.5\]]bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/
[\[373b.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[373b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i 
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[374a.2\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams kyi de bzhin 
[\[374a.3\]]nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha 
[\[374a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[374a.5\]]pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par 
[\[374a.6\]]shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid 
[\[374a.7\]]zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa'i de bzhin 
[\[374b.2\]]nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[374b.3\]]pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/
[\[374b.4\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha 
[\[374b.5\]]ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/
[\[374b.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa 
[\[374b.7\]]nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin 
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de 
[\[375a.2\]]bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab 
[\[375a.3\]]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_
[\[375a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[375a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[375a.6\]]phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/
[\[375a.7\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po'i de bzhin nyid zab 
[\[375b.2\]]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[375b.3\]]pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/
[\[375b.4\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de 
[\[375b.5\]]bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de 
[\[375b.6\]]bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[375b.7\]]bu mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa 
[\[376a.2\]]bzhi'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid zab 
[\[376a.3\]]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin 
[\[376a.4\]]nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[376a.5\]]de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs 
[\[376a.6\]]gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes gting dpag 
[\[376a.7\]]dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa gting dpag 
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_
[\[376b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[376b.3\]]pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/
[\[376b.4\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[376b.5\]]dri gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg gting dpag dka' 
[\[376b.6\]]ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' 
[\[376b.7\]]ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/
[\[377a.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag 
[\[377a.3\]]dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[377a.4\]]gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[377a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i 
[\[377a.6\]]phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 
[\[377a.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[377b.2\]]tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/
[\[377b.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[377b.4\]]ti'i bu [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[377b.5\]]ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag 
[\[377b.6\]]dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra 
[\[377b.7\]]dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/
[\[378a.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa gting dpag 
[\[378a.3\]]dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes 
[\[378a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes 
[\[378a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' 
[\[378a.6\]]ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]
[\[378a.7\]]tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang 
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[378b.2\]]gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[378b.3\]]gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa 
[\[378b.4\]]nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa 
[\[378b.5\]]stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[378b.6\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[378b.7\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[379a.2\]]gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[379a.3\]]gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[379a.4\]]gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag 
[\[379a.5\]]dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha 
[\[379a.6\]]ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag 
[\[379a.7\]]dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/
[\[379b.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gting 
[\[379b.3\]]dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gting dpag dka' 
[\[379b.4\]]ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting 
[\[379b.5\]]dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[379b.6\]]bzhi gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[379b.7\]]'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[380a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[380a.3\]]phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[380a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna 
[\[380a.5\]]ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa

[\[383a.5\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_/gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar 
[\[383a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'du shes zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/
[\[383a.7\]]gal te 'du byed zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te [{]myig [,]mig [}]zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes 
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rna ba zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sna zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te lce zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_
[\[383b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te lus zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te yid zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs zab/_
[\[383b.3\]]ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sgra zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te dri zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/
[\[383b.4\]]gal te ro zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te reg zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te chos zab ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol

[\[388a.3\]]de ni/_'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

[\[388a.5\]]bzhin stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang 
[\[388a.6\]]yin pa de ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[388a.7\]]stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/dran pa 
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang 
[\[388b.2\]]yin pa de ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no/_/dbang po rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_dbang po rnams ma yin no/_/stobs rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_stobs rnams ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[388b.3\]]kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid 
[\[388b.4\]]gang yin pa de ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_bsam gtan rnams ma yin no/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ma yin no/_/
[\[388b.5\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no/_/mthar 
[\[388b.6\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i zab pa nyid gang 
[\[388b.7\]]yin pa de ni/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin no/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi zab pa 
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]nyid gang yin pa de ni/_ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_de 
[\[389a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no/_/
[\[389a.3\]]snying rje chen po'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_snying rje chen po ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ma yin no/_/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi zab 
[\[389a.4\]]pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rnam pa 
[\[389a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[389a.6\]]pa la spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'du shes gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'du 
[\[389a.7\]]byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te [{]myig [,]mig [}]gting dpag dka'

[\[389b.1\]]zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rna ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sna gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha

[\[389b.6\]]dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka'

[\[390a.3\]]zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya 
[\[390a.4\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag

[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]gal te srid pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te skye ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rga shi gting

[\[391a.7\]]gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te chen po stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' 
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya 
[\[391b.2\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka'

[\[391b.4\]]mi spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[391b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te dbang po rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[392a.2\]]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te stobs rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes 
[\[392a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[392a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad gting dpag dka' 
[\[392a.6\]]zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[392a.7\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/
[\[392b.2\]]gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal 
[\[392b.3\]]te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te snying rje chen po gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sangs 
[\[392b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod do/_/gal te thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 
[\[392b.5\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[392b.6\]]zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_gzugs ma yin no/_/tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_tshor ba ma yin no/_/'du shes kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_'du shes ma yin no/_/'du 
[\[392b.7\]]byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_'du byed ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ma yin no/_/rna ba'i gting

[\[393a.1\]]dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_rna ba ma yin no/_/sna'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_sna ma yin no/_/lce'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_lce ma yin no/_/lus kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa 
[\[393a.2\]]de ni/_lus ma yin no/_/yid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_yid ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_gzugs ma yin no/_/sgra'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_sgra ma yin no/_/dri'i gting 
[\[393a.3\]]dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_dri ma yin no/_/ro'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_ro ma yin no/_/reg gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_reg ma yin no/_/chos kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_chos ma yin no/_/
[\[393a.4\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i gting

[\[397a\]]
[\[397a.1\]]ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/
[\[397a.2\]]gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol

[\[397b\]]
[\[397b.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te skye mched drug tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te reg pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te tshor

[\[398a\]]
[\[398a.1\]]pa nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te stong pa

[\[398a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[398b\]]
[\[398b.1\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[398b.2\]]nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te yang dag par spong 
[\[398b.3\]]ba rnams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te dbang po rnams 
[\[398b.4\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te stobs rnams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshad 
[\[398b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa

[\[399a\]]
[\[399a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/
[\[399a.2\]]gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te mngon par shes pa rnams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes 
[\[399a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[399a.4\]]pa la spyod do/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[399a.5\]]spyod do/_/gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te snying rje chen po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal 
[\[399a.6\]]te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te thams cad shes pa nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/
[\[399a.7\]]gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//_//
